Uses of Interface
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log.Logger

  • Packages that use Logger 
    Package Description
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.analytics
    Useful when it comes to handle analytics reporting in an industrial way.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app
    Contains all the Activity basis classes, an Android Application class, and some classes useful to activities.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.appwidget
    Handles Android desktop widgets.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache
    Contains some caching features, based on RAM or/and the SD card (persistence) of the terminal.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.config
    Contains a compact framework for handling the process configuration.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.content
    This package is a counterpart of the android.content Android package.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download
    Contains utilities for downloading bitmaps and binding them to ImageView or any widget which can display a Bitmap.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework
    Defines some common types used throughout the library.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log
    Wraps and frameworks the Android menu feature.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ui
    Some User Interface (UI) widgets.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ws
    A framework for the Web Services (WS).

    • Uses of Logger in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log

      Classes in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log that implement Logger 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AndroidLogger
      The logger implementation for Android.
      class  Log4JLogger
      The logger implementation for Log4J, which works with the "android-logging-log4j" library.
      class  LoggerWrapper
      A class which enables to wrap a Logger, and to delegate all its interface methods to its underlying logger.
      class  NativeLogger
      An implementation which uses the Java standard output and error streams.
      Methods in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log that return Logger 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Logger LoggerFactory.getInstance(java.lang.Class<?> theClass) 
      static Logger LoggerFactory.getInstance(java.lang.String category) 
      Logger Loggerable.getLogger() 
      Logger LoggerFactory.LoggerConfigurator.getLogger(java.lang.Class<?> theClass)
      The method will be invoked by the LoggerFactory.getInstance(Class) every time a logger needs to be created.
      Logger LoggerFactory.LoggerConfigurator.getLogger(java.lang.String category)
      The method will be invoked by the LoggerFactory.getInstance(String) every time a logger needs to be created.
      Constructors in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log with parameters of type Logger 
      Constructor and Description
      LoggerWrapper(java.lang.Class<?> theClass, Logger logger)
      Equivalent to using the LoggerWrapper.LoggerWrapper(String, Logger) constructor, by passing theClass.getSimpleName() as second argument.
      LoggerWrapper(java.lang.String category, Logger logger)
      Creates a wrapper around the provided Logger instance.
